description: I was not able to compile the binary file for Espanso so this helped great for me! Thanks to the devs

I'd love a GUI to simplify configuring more complex Espanso snippets, but this veels very incomplete. I get crashes when selecting some of my match files, and the GUI only seems to be set up to create simple static "trigger > replace" matches. These are dead simple to set up by hand. Creating more complex matches, like Forms, aren't supported, and these are the sorts of things that you'd really want help with in setting up Espanso. I hope this continues development, but for now it's not something I'll be using.
summary: A good idea that needs work

description: Was glad to see it in the discover-app but apparently it doesn't work on Fedora :( The CPU-power is rising to 100% once started and sadly therefore the program gets killed - it is probably (pretty sure) not a virus though - please fix devs, then you get my 5 stars
